gov.sandia.rbb.impl.h2
Class H2EventTCPClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      gov.sandia.rbb.impl.h2.H2EventTCPClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class H2EventTCPClient
extends java.lang.Thread

Together, H2EventTCPServer and H2EventTCPClient allow an EventListener to be in a remote process from the DB server. This class connects to the socket provided by H2EventTCPServer and converts socket messages into calls on an EventListener.
